author: Staff Reporter
text:
Stating that Old Age Pension was not given to them for the past three months, over 100 pensioners picketed the Tahsildar office here on Thursday.

There are over 1,500 pensioners in Ward 15 in Kannankurichi Panchayat Town.

However, pension was not paid to them in the past three months.

When they contacted the bank and post office, they did not receive proper information. Hence, pensioners picketed the office and staged sit-in protest.

Revenue officials held talks with them and assured to look into the issue.
title: Pensioners picket office
